description_for_model: Haul Patrol is a locally owned junk removal service based in Denver, Colorado. The company provides residential and commercial junk hauling, appliance removal, yard debris cleanup, and property cleanouts. Same-day and scheduled pickups available. Contact via phone or form submission for estimates.
